channel.title: Election on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Election on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
item.description: A time jump picks things up two years after the events of season three, but “this season ends right before the election,” EP Mimi Leder confirms.

item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
